recipe.title: Corn and Bell Pepper Salad
ingredients: 1 10-ounce package frozen whole kernel corn, cooked according to package directions, drained
instructions: Mix first 8 ingredients in medium bowl. Season with salt and pepper. Place red lettuce leaves on plates. Spoon salad onto lettuce. Top with fresh cilantro sprigs and serve.
